short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A website that allows people to rent tools from each other

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1000 Tools is a website that allows people to rent tools from others.  It is a growing network of people like you excited about the idea of renting out tools and getting advice for their DIY projects.  1000 Tools securely handles payments and ensures your tools are protected through a security deposit.  

Install this app and gain access to thousands of tools!
